title: Structured Practice and Reflective Processes for Developing Computer-Mediated Communication (CMC) Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and foundational communication knowledge
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, combining online platforms and offline activities for blended instruction.

learning_goals: Learners can apply effective communication strategies using CMC tools across diverse online environments.
Learners practice and reflect in journals on methods for composing and transmitting messages that consider cultural and social contexts.
Learners can compare and analyze differences in communication effectiveness based on digital media characteristics (text/emoji/video, etc.).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
